title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research               Research         "Contrabands" at Camp Brightwood Library of Congress  African American Civil War Descendants Study Can you trace your family to the Civil War period in Washington, DC? The National Park Service, in partnership with American University, is undertaking a project to document the local history of African American communities associated with eight Civil War Defense sites in DC.
